Slide to show the progression of Camp fire

In November 2018, the Camp fire scorched 153,336 acres and destroyed over 18,000 buildings, and was the deadliest and most destructive fire event in Californiaâ€™s history. This visualization demonstrates the daily spread of Camp fire and visualizes the corresponding pre-fire conditions and post-fire damages.
